name: ((x - m.x / 1) * m.x) % (y - m.y / 1)
description: This interactive Tron-like canvas illustrates the above formula. It's run once every 33.33ms, when each pixel on the canvas is scanned left-to-right, top-to-bottom: x = pixel's x position | y = pixel's y position | m.x = mouse's x position | m.y = mouse's y position. Inspired by Martin Kleppe's tweet here: https://twitter.com/aemkei/status/1378106731386040322?s=20
